kp2:1.1: I undertake the precept to refrain from killing living creatures.
kp2:2.1: I undertake the precept to refrain from stealing.
kp2:3.1: I undertake the precept to refrain from sexual activity.
kp2:4.1: I undertake the precept to refrain from lying.
kp2:5.1: I undertake the precept to refrain from taking alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
kp2:6.1: I undertake the precept to refrain from food at the wrong time.
kp2:7.1: I undertake the precept to refrain from dancing, singing, music, and seeing shows.
kp2:8.1: I undertake the precept to refrain from beautifying and adorning myself with garlands, perfumes, and makeup.
kp2:9.1: I undertake the precept to refrain from high and luxurious beds.
kp2:10.1: I undertake the precept to refrain from receiving gold and money.
